review: Had some problems initially because I was not using the included HDMI extender but once I put that in, no problems.
author: Mike Cocchiola

review: This device is much better than Google' chromecast!
author: Amazon Customer

review: This was really simple to get our old TV up to date and now we have a smart TV for our guest room.
author: kathy1950

review: Returning this because it constantly said it was searching for internet. I did do a little searching and found others with the same problem, but didn't see a clear solution. I don't want to have to try this hard to watch TV.
author: B. Ireland "chickencrazy"

review: Love the simple install and useage. Little upset about the rental prices, not high just was not expecting them.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent product.  It was easy to connect and was shipped timely.
author: D. Heard

review: I love that I can watch the show and movies from Amazon Prime on the TV instead of my Kindle and I can still use my Kindle to read my e-mails or play my games at the same time.
author: Ernestina Carcana

review: The Fire stick is easy to use and to set up. I am very happy with the purchase.
author: Kimberly
